name: Vietnamese Spicy Sausage & Egg Stir-Fry (Chả Trứng Cay)
step_by_step: Slice sausage and hot dogs into thin coins; julienne bell pepper, carrot and onion; dice tomato.
Heat 1 Tbsp oil in wok on high, sear sausage and hot dogs 90 sec until edges caramelise.
Push meats to side, pour in beaten eggs, scramble just until set, then fold together.
Add onion, carrot, bell pepper, stir-fry 2 min until crisp-tender.
Add tomato, 1 tsp sugar, 1.5 Tbsp fish sauce, 1 Tbsp sriracha, 1 min more.
Finish with pinch white pepper and Thai basil, serve immediately with steamed rice or rice noodles.
